description: A former government research facility island that was destroyed by Caesar Clown's weapon experiment, leaving it split between fire and ice. The island served as Caesar's base for illegal experiments on children and SMILE production.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Prepare to Leave Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: After defeating Caesar Clown and forming an alliance with Law, the Straw Hat Pirates make final preparations to depart from Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Punk Hazard Arc and the beginning of the alliance's journey toward Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: The Alliance Sets Sail from Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat-Heart Pirate alliance officially departs from Punk Hazard together, sailing toward their next destination.
keyEvents.significance: Concludes the Punk Hazard Arc and sets up the Dressrosa Arc.

climate: Split between extreme fire and ice
